sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from "react"; type CartItemProps = { item: { imageUrl: string, name: string, type: string, size: number, count: number, id: number, price: number }, i: number, onDecrementCount: (price: number, id: number) => void, onIncrementCount: (price: number, id: number) => void, onDeleteItem: (i: number, price: number, count: number) => void } const CartItem: React.FC = ({item, i, onDecrementCount, onIncrementCount, onDeleteItem}) => { const isDisableRef = useRef(null); return (

{item.name}

{item.type} тесто, {item.size} см.

{item.count}
{item.price * item.count} ₽
onDeleteItem(i, item.price, item.count)} className="button button--outline button--circle">
) } export default CartItem;
